TI: [The conjoint relationships of the epiphysis and hippocampus in the shaping of the reaction to stress].
AB: Pinealectomy and electrolytic destruction in different directions changed the behaviour of rats in a conflict situation and the temporal organization of forced swimming. Combination of both kinds of surgery decreased the behavioural shifts produced by the hippocampal lesions. It is suggested that the anti-stressor properties of the pineal gland can be realized through changes in the hippocampal function state.
TT: Sopriazhennye otnosheniia epifiza i gippokampa pri formirovanii reaktsii na stress.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1997 Jul-Aug;47(4):725-30.
